Free Pascal and Lazarus

19 Mar 2013

Free Pascal and Lazarus



As a bit of a bookmark note to myself, for one of those rainy days when I want to take a trip back to the 90's - it seems that some serious traction has been made in the Pascal community through the projects Free Pascal and Lazarus.
